verses.verse: And in that day <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, I will praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee: though thou wast angry <S%H599><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with me, thine anger <S%H639><s%> is turned away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thou comfortedst <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me.

Behold, 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> is my salvation <S%H3444><s%>; I will trust <S%H982><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and not be afraid <S%H6342><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: for the YY <S%H3050><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my song <S%H2176><s%>; he also is become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
Therefore with joy <S%H8342><s%> shall ye draw <S%H7579><s%> <S%H8804><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the wells <S%H4599><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>, declare <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8685><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>, make mention <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8685><s%> that his name <S%H8034><s%> is exalted <S%H7682><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

Sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; for he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> excellent things <S%H1348><s%>: this is known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8716><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8794><s%> in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Cry out <S%H6670><s%> <S%H8761><s%> and shout <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>: for great <S%H1419><s%> is HaKadosh <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee.
